Detailed Description

Implementation of the standard pwd command.

Prints the current working directory

Author:
Bishal Santra

Function Documentation

int main (  ) 

Main of myps program.

First it gets the pid of the process using getpid() function. Reads the /proc/[pid]/cwd file to get the current working directory of this process

Returns:
int(0)
